name: Locomorphosis
description:
Locomorphosis, or: "how I woke up, only to realize I had turned into an unstoppable train locomotive".

Objective: survive as long as you can. Do not fall off!

Controls:

- Left click: place item 

- Right click: rotate item

- Click a card: switch items

Additional controls:

- Number keys/ space bar to switch items

- R: rescale game window

- Shift: counter rotate item

You can place items in any open space, be it solid ground or the void.

Do your best to conserve resources and use each available to its best ability.

Stay vigilant!

Enjoy!

Team:

Fufu (programmer, game design)

Essence (game design, art)

Katonio (music)

Lobsterblues (game title)
